title: İlham Kərimov
text: İlham Kərimov (born 2 July 1976) is an Azerbaijani <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20heavyweight">men's light heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>.
